description.english: Complete the train.
description.french: Compléter le train.
description.italian: Completa il livello del treno.
description.spanish: Completa el tren.
description.japanese: 列車をクリアした

displayName.schinese: 无法开启通往天堂之门
displayName.tchinese: 無法開啟通往天堂之門

description.english: Complete the training facility.
description.french: Compléter le centre de formation.
description.italian: Completa il centro di addestramento.
description.spanish: Completa el centro de formación.
description.japanese: 養成所をクリアした

description.english: Complete the laboratory.
description.french: Compléter le laboratoire.
description.italian: Completa l'area del laboratorio.
description.spanish: Completa el laboratorio de investigación.
description.japanese: 研究所をクリアした

description.english: Complete the factory.
description.french: Compléter l'usine.
description.italian: Completa la fabbrica.
description.spanish: Completa la fábrica.
description.japanese: 工場をクリアした

description.english: Complete the treatment plant.
description.french: Compléter l'usine de traitement.
description.italian: Completa lo stabilimento rifiuti.
description.spanish: Completa la planta procesadora.
description.japanese: 処理場をクリアした

displayName.japanese: 化け物野郎！食らいやがれ！！

description.english: Finish the game with rank S.
description.german: Das Spiel mit Rang S abgeschlossen.
description.french: Compléter le jeu avec le rang S.
description.italian: Completa il gioco con votazione S.
description.spanish: Completa el juego con rango S.
description.schinese: 以 S 级完成游戏
description.tchinese: 以 S 級完成遊戲
description.japanese: ランク　S　でゲームをクリアした

description.english: Finish the game on Hard difficulty.
description.german: Das Spiel auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Schwer" abgeschlossen.
description.french: Compléter le jeu en difficulté Difficile.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a difficoltà Difficile.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo difícil.
description.schinese: 以 Hard 难度完成游戏
description.tchinese: 以 Hard 難度完成遊戲
description.japanese: 難易度　HARD　でクリアした

displayName.spanish: La hierba no es lo tuyo

description.english: Finish the game without combining herbs.
description.german: Das Spiel abgeschlossen, ohne Kräuter zu kombinieren.
description.french: Compléter le jeu sans mélanger d'herbes.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza combinare alcuna erba.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin mezclar hierbas.
description.schinese: 在未进行药草调合的情况下完成游戏
description.tchinese: 在未進行藥草調合的情況下完成遊戲
description.japanese: ハーブの調合を1度も行わずゲームをクリアした

description.english: Finish the game without saving.
description.german: Das Spiel abgeschlossen, ohne ein Farbband zu verwenden.
description.french: Compléter le jeu sans utiliser de ruban encreur.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza usare i nastri inchiostratori.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin guardar la partida.
description.schinese: 在未进行保存的情况下完成游戏
description.tchinese: 在未進行保存的情況下完成遊戲
description.japanese: インクリボンを使用せずクリアした

description.english: Finish the game without using a First-Aid Spray.
description.german: Das Spiel abgeschlossen, ohne ein Erste-Hilfe-Spray zu verwenden.
description.french: Compléter le jeu sans utiliser de spray de premiers secours.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza usare lo spray curativo.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin usar ningún spray de emergencia.
description.schinese: 在未使用急救喷雾罐的情况下完成游戏
description.tchinese: 在未使用急救噴霧罐的情況下完成遊戲
description.japanese: 救急スプレーを使用せずクリアした

description.english: Finish the game without using a recovery item (including Green Chemicals).
description.german: Das Spiel abgeschlossen, ohne Heilmittel zu verwenden. (Schließt grüne Kräuter ein)
description.french: Compléter le jeu sans utiliser d'objet de soin (substances vertes incluses).
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza usare oggetti curativi (sostanza verde inclusa).
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin usar ningún objeto de recuperación (incluído los químicos verdes).
description.schinese: 在未使用任何恢复物品（包括绿色化学物质）的情况下完成游戏
description.tchinese: 在未使用任何恢復物品（包括綠色化學物質）的情況下完成遊戲
description.japanese: 回復アイテムを未使用でゲームをクリアした(緑の薬品の使用も不可)

displayName.japanese: 無賃乗車は許されない

description.english: Defeat Stinger.
description.french: Vaincre le Stinger.
description.italian: Sconfiggi lo Stinger.
description.spanish: Derrota al Stinger.
description.japanese: スティンガーを倒した

description.english: Defeat Centurion.
description.french: Vaincre le Centurion.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Centurion.
description.spanish: Derrota al Centurion.
description.japanese: センチュリオンを倒した

displayName.japanese: ここはお前に似合わない

description.english: Defeat Infected Bat.
description.french: Vaincre la Chauve-Souris infectée.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Pipistrello infetto.
description.spanish: Derrota al Muerciélago Infectado.
description.japanese: インフェクティッドバットを倒した

description.english: Fight off the Proto Tyrant.
description.french: Repousser le Proto-Tyran.
description.italian: Respingi il Proto Tyrant.
description.spanish: Deshazte del Prototyrant.
description.japanese: プロトタイラントを撃退した

description.english: Defeat the Proto Tyrant.
description.french: Vaincre le Proto-Tyran.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Proto Tyrant.
description.spanish: Derrota al Prototyrant.
description.japanese: プロトタイラントを倒した

description.english: Defeat Queen Leech.
description.french: Vaincre la Reine Sangsue.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la sanguisuga regina
description.spanish: Derrota a la Sanguijuela Reina.
description.japanese: 女王ヒルを倒した

displayName.japanese: お嬢さんって呼ばないで！

description.english: Defeat all bosses except Centurion using Rebecca.
description.german: Alle Endgegner mit Rebecca besiegt. (Centurion ausgenommen)
description.french: Vaincre tous les boss avec Rebecca (sauf le Centurion).
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i boss con Rebecca (Centurion escluso).
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los jefes con Rebecca
description.schinese: 使用蕾贝卡打倒巨型蜈蚣以外的所有头目
description.tchinese: 使用蕾貝卡打倒巨型蜈蚣以外的所有頭目
description.japanese: 全てのボスをレベッカ操作で倒した(センチュリオンは除く)

displayName.japanese: 二度と彷徨わぬように

description.english: Defeat an enemy with a critical-hit headshot.
description.german: Einen Gegner mit einem Kopfschuss (kritischer Treffer) besiegt.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi d'un tir dans la tête (coup critique).
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nemico con un colpo alla testa critico.
description.spanish: Tumba a un enemigo de un disparo crítico a la cabeza.
description.schinese: 以爆头（致命一击）的方式打倒敌人
description.tchinese: 以爆頭（致命一擊）的方式打倒敵人
description.japanese: ヘッドショット(クリティカルヒット)で敵を倒した

description.english: Defeat an enemy by burning them.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi en le brûlant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nemico bruciandolo.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo prendiéndole fuego.
description.japanese: 敵を燃やして倒した

description.english: Defeat a zombie by stomping on them.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi en le piétinant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi uno zombi schiacciandolo.
description.spanish: Elimina a un zombi aplastándolo.
description.japanese: ゾンビを踏み付けで倒した

displayName.french: Ne faites pas ça chez vous

description.english: Create a Molotov Cocktail.
description.french: Fabriquer un cocktail Molotov.
description.italian: Crea un cocktail molotov.
description.spanish: Fabrica un cóctel Molotov.
description.japanese: 火炎ビンを作成した

displayName.spanish: Se nos va a ensuciar igual

description.english: Change into a costume.
description.french: Changer de costume.
description.italian: Cambia costume.
description.spanish: Cambia de traje.
description.japanese: コスチュームを変更した

displayName.english: Here I Come to Save the Day

description.english: Attack an enemy to save your partner who is grappling with that enemy.
description.german: Den Partner befreit, als dieser vom Gegner gepackt wurde.
description.french: Libérer votre partenaire des griffes d'un ennemi.
description.italian: Salva il partner dalla presa di un nemico.
description.spanish: Salva a tu compañero de las garras del enemigo.
description.schinese: 攻击抓住伙伴的敌人以拯救伙伴
description.tchinese: 攻擊抓住夥伴的敵人以拯救夥伴
description.japanese: 仲間を掴んでいる敵を攻撃し救助した

displayName.spanish: Las armas no son lo tuyo

description.english: Defeat an enemy with a knife.
description.german: Einen Gegner mit dem Messer besiegt.
description.french: Tuer un ennemi avec le couteau.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nemico con il coltello.
description.spanish: Elimina a un enemigo con el cuchillo.
description.japanese: 敵をナイフで倒した

description.english: Destroy a zombie's legs.
description.french: Détruire les jambes d'un zombie.
description.italian: Distruggi le gambe di uno zombi.
description.spanish: Destruye las piernas de un zombi.
description.japanese: ゾンビの足を破壊した

description.english: Shoot down a Hunter or an Eliminator while they are jump attacking in the air.
description.german: Einen im Sprung befindlichen Hunter oder Eliminator heruntergeschossen.
description.french: Abattre un Hunter ou un Eliminator en plein saut.
description.italian: Abbatti un Hunter o un Eliminator in salto.
description.spanish: Interrumpe el salto de un Hunter o de un Eliminator de un tiro.
description.schinese: 趁猎杀者或消灭者在空中使出跳跃攻击时将其击落
description.tchinese: 趁獵殺者或消滅者在空中使出跳躍攻擊時將其擊落
description.japanese: ジャンプ攻撃中のハンター又はエリミネーターを撃ち落とした

description.english: Break free of a Cerberus while they are biting you or trying to push you down.
description.german: Einen Cerberus abgeschüttelt, der sich an Ihren Arm festgebissen oder Sie überwältigt hat.
description.french: Se libérer d'un Cerbère qui vous mord ou qui essaie de vous pousser.
description.italian: Liberati da un Cerberus mentre ti sta mordendo o quando cerca di farti cadere.
description.spanish: Escapa de un Cerberus mientras te muerde o te ataca.
description.schinese: 在被地狱犬咬或是扑倒时挣脱
description.tchinese: 在被地獄犬咬或是撲倒時掙脫
description.japanese: ケルベロスの腕かみつき又は押し倒しを振りほどいた

description.english: Create a Custom Handgun.
description.french: Fabriquer un pistolet personnalisé.
description.italian: Crea una pistola personalizzata.
description.spanish: Crea una pistola personalizada.
description.japanese: カスタムハンドガンを作成した

description.english: Use a Green Chemical.
description.french: Utiliser une substance verte.
description.italian: Usa una sostanza verde.
description.spanish: Usa un químico verde.
description.japanese: 緑の薬品を使用した

description.english: Defeat Mimicry Marcus with a Molotov Cocktail or a Napalm Grenade.
description.german: Mimikry-Marcus mit Molotowcocktails oder Napalmgranaten besiegt.
description.french: Tuer un simulacre de Marcus avec un cocktail Molotov ou une grenade au Napalm.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Mimicry Marcus con un cocktail molotov o una granata al napalm.
description.spanish: Derrota a Mimicry Marcus con una bomba de napalm o con un cóctel Molotov.
description.schinese: 使用汽油弹或烧夷弹打倒拟态马可斯
description.tchinese: 使用汽油彈或燒夷彈打倒擬態馬可斯
description.japanese: 擬態マーカスを火炎ビン又は焼夷弾で倒した

description.english: Read all files.
description.french: Lire tous les fichiers.
description.italian: Leggi tutti i file.
description.spanish: Lee todos los archivos.
description.japanese: 全てのファイルを読んだ

description.english: Obtain all keys and use them all.
description.german: Alle Schlüssel gefunden und mindestens einmal benutzt.
description.french: Récupérer et utiliser toutes les clés.
description.italian: Ottieni e utilizza tutte le chiavi.
description.spanish: Obtén todas las llaves y úsalas.
description.japanese: すべての鍵を入手して1回以上使用した

description.english: Defeat Mimicry Marcus for the first time only using a knife.
description.german: Mimikry-Marcus nur mit dem Messer besiegt. (Kein Schaden außer durch das Messer)
description.french: Tuer un simulacre de Marcus avec le couteau uniquement.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Mimicry Marcus per la prima volta usando solo il coltello.
description.spanish: Derrota a Mimicry Marcus por primera vez sólo con el cuchillo.
description.schinese: 只使用小刀打倒拟态马可斯
description.tchinese: 只使用小刀打倒擬態馬可斯
description.japanese: 擬態マーカスをナイフのみで初めて倒した(ナイフ以外のダメージは不可)

description.english: Combine every type of herb with each other.
description.french: Réaliser toutes les combinaisons d'herbes possibles.
description.italian: Effettua tutte le combinazioni di erbe possibili.
description.spanish: Realiza todas las combinaciones de hierbas posibles.
description.japanese: 各ハーブの組み合わせを全て行った

description.english: Obtain all weapons.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les armes du jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le armi.
description.spanish: Obtén todas las armas.
description.japanese: ゲーム中全ての武器を入手した

description.english: Defeat 16 bats in the church.
description.french: Tuer 16 chauves-souris dans la chapelle.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 16 pipistrelli nella chiesa.
description.spanish: Derrota a 16 murciélagos en la capilla.
description.schinese: 在教堂内杀死 16 只蝙蝠
description.tchinese: 在教堂內殺死 16 隻蝙蝠
description.japanese: 礼拝堂内のバットを16体以上倒した

displayName.german: An mir sieht es cool aus
displayName.japanese: 見せる相手は死者ばかり

description.english: Put on Team Wesker costume.
description.french: Revêtir le costume "Unité Wesker".
description.italian: Indossa il costume della Squadra Wesker.
description.spanish: Ponte el traje del Equipo Wesker.
description.japanese: 黒のマリオネットに着替えた

description.english: Play the piano using Rebecca.
description.french: Jouer du piano avec Rebecca.
description.italian: Suona il pianoforte con Rebecca.
description.spanish: Toca el piano con Rebecca.
description.japanese: レベッカでピアノを演奏した

displayName.english: I'm a Medic, Not a Bodybuilder
displayName.schinese: 我是医护士，不是健美小姐
displayName.tchinese: 我是醫護士，不是健美小姐

description.english: Try to push something heavy with Rebecca.
description.french: Tenter de pousser un objet lourd avec Rebecca.
description.italian: Prova a spingere qualcosa di pesante con Rebecca.
description.spanish: Trata de empujar un objeto pesado con Rebecca.
description.schinese: 尝试使用蕾贝卡推动重物
description.tchinese: 嘗試使用蕾貝卡推動重物
description.japanese: レベッカのか弱い一面を見た

description.english: Get picked up by the Infected Bat.
description.french: Être soulevé par la Chauve-souris infectée.
description.italian: Fatti afferrare dal Pipistrello infetto.
description.spanish: Deja que el Murciélago Infectado te levante del suelo.
description.japanese: インフェクティッドバットに持ち上げられた

description.english: Play Leech Hunter.
description.french: Jouer au mode Leech Hunter.
description.italian: Gioca a Leech Hunter.
description.spanish: Juega al modo Leech Hunter.
description.japanese: リーチハンターをプレイした

description.english: Finish Leech Hunter with rank A.
description.french: Compléter le mode Leech Hunter avec le rang A.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Leech Hunter con voto A.
description.spanish: Completa el modo Leech Hunter con rango A.
description.schinese: 以 A 级完成水蛭猎人
description.tchinese: 以 A 級完成水蛭獵人
description.japanese: ランク　A　でリーチハンターをクリアした

description.english: Finish Leech Hunter with rank E or above.
description.german: "Leech Hunter" mit mindestens Rang E abgeschlossen.
description.french: Compléter le mode Leech Hunter avec le rang E au minimum.
description.italian: Completa la modalità Leech Hunter con voto E o superiore.
description.spanish: Completado el modo Leech Hunter con rango E o superior.
description.schinese: 以 E 级以上完成水蛭猎人
description.tchinese: 以 E 級以上完成水蛭獵人
description.japanese: ランク　E　以上でリーチハンターをクリアした

description.english: Collect all of only one color of Leech Charms.
description.german: Nur eine Sorte der Egel-Amulette vollständig eingesammelt.
description.french: Récupérer toutes les amulettes sangsues d'une seule couleur.
description.italian: Colleziona tutti gli amuleti sanguisuga di un colore.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los amuletos de un color.
description.schinese: 只集齐一种颜色的水蛭饰品
description.tchinese: 只集齊一種顏色的水蛭飾品
description.japanese: 片方のヒルのオブジェのみ全て集めてクリアした

description.english: Defeat all enemies in Leech Hunter.
description.french: Tuer tous les ennemis en mode Leech Hunter.
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i nemici a Leech Hunter.
description.spanish: Elimina a todos los enemigos del modo Leech Hunter.
description.schinese: 在水蛭猎人中杀死所有敌人
description.tchinese: 在水蛭獵人中殺死所有敵人
description.japanese: リーチハンターで全ての敵を倒した

description.english: Kill 50 enemies with the Death Stare at full charge.
description.german: Mit dem Todesblick auf voller Stärke 50 Gegner besiegt.
description.french: Tuer 50 ennemis en utilisant le "Regard mortel" à pleine puissance.
description.italian: Elimina 50 nemici con lo "Sguardo letale" alla massima potenza.
description.spanish: Elimina a 50 enemigos con Mirada letal cargada al máximo.
description.schinese: 以蓄满力的死亡凝视杀死 50 个敌人
description.tchinese: 以蓄滿力的死亡凝視殺死 50 個敵人
description.japanese: 赤の斬撃の溜めを最大状態で使用し　敵を50体倒した
